channel.title: MapData Dumping 508, Connects to RS
channel.description:
Since RuneScape is already past 503, our only chance of getting 'MapData' is going by really fast. And no one has publicly released a deob client that connects to RS and dumps the MapData to a central location, so I am.
[b]You cannot click options on Npcs, or objects with this client.[/b] (Because it is modified) If anyone knows how to fix this please post here or PM me. What you do is you goto the area in RuneScape that you want the MapData for. Then, you logout and login using this client. All the MapData that is collected is sent to a server I am running, and it saves the collected data into MySQL.
[b]All the collected data can be viewed at [url=http://www.allgofree.org/allgofree/new/mapdata.php]http://www.allgofree.org/allgofree/new/mapdata.php[/url]![/b] Once RuneScape updates, I'll dump the MapData into text files that your RS2E 503 servers can read, and I'll post a download link.
[b]You can download the client from [url=http://www.allgofree.org/rs/508/rs508_dump_client_v2.zip]http://www.allgofree.org/rs/508/rs508_dump_client.zip[/url].
V2: MapData is also saved on your computer in a folder called MapData for your personal use! :cool: [/b]
[b][u]Please take the time to do this, as Jagex is not lazy and won't wait to update because you want to collect your MapData later. This is probably the last chance to get anything your missing.
Make sure that any skills you want working have the areas required for them. For example right now realistic RuneCrafting is screwed.[/u][/b]
[center][b]Known Missing MapData:[/b][/center] [b] • All of the RuneCrafting Alters • Castle Wars • Parts of the Wilderness[/b]

item.title: MapData Dumping 508, Connects to RS
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

I’m making it dump the MapData to text files on the computer its running on as well as the central server, so you cna use your own data without waiting on me.

And I may release an open source version, you can download a 508 deob with that program in the Server Downloads section. All I did was add some code that dumps the MapData when the server sends it. Cellkyborg also knows how to make Npc and Object options work, so then you’ll actually because to play the game while dumping data.

Read full topic

item.title: MapData Dumping 508, Connects to RS
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Since RuneScape is already past 503, our only chance of getting ‘MapData’ is going by really fast. And no one has publicly released a deob client that connects to RS and dumps the MapData to a central location, so I am.

You cannot click options on Npcs, or objects with this client. (Because it is modified) If anyone knows how to fix this please post here or PM me. What you do is you goto the area in RuneScape that you want the MapData for. Then, you logout and login using this client. All the MapData that is collected is sent to a server I am running, and it saves the collected data into MySQL.

All the collected data can be viewed at http://www.allgofree.org/allgofree/new/mapdata.php!
Once RuneScape updates, I’ll dump the MapData into text files that your RS2E 503 servers can read, and I’ll post a download link.

[b]You can download the client from http://www.allgofree.org/rs/508/rs508_dump_client.zip.

V2: MapData is also saved on your computer in a folder called MapData for your personal use!
[/b]

[b][u]Please take the time to do this, as Jagex is not lazy and won’t wait to update because you want to collect your MapData later. This is probably the last chance to get anything your missing.

Make sure that any skills you want working have the areas required for them. For example right now realistic RuneCrafting is screwed.[/u][/b]

[center]Known Missing MapData:[/center]

• All of the RuneCrafting Alters
• Castle Wars
• Parts of the Wilderness

Read full topic
